0.text: Bug 104397  JDBC Data Set Editor showing empty/system schemas.

1.text: Some recent enhancements to the JDBC Data Set Editor in 1.0.1 dev build has introduced an unintended side effect: the Schema browser now shows empty and/or system schemas, which are never used to build queries.

2.text: This is a regression against 1.0.0 Final.

3.text: See attached screenshot for an example.

4.text: This is shown when creating a Sample DB data set.

5.text: Note that the "Available Items" pane shows a large number of empty and system schema names (APP, SYS, SYSCAT, etc.).

6.text: Previously with 1.0.0 Final build, only the "CLASSICMODELS" schema is shown.

7.text: We need to preserve that behavior.
